channel.title: All of my questions.im leaving sewn.!
channel.description:
okay heres my questions cuz im not gonna be able to open up 'internet explorer' until about 3 months,okay.
#1.how do i make jad dropfire capes rarely.
[color=yellow][#2.what is a good forum to use.(that has rep)/color]
[color=pink][#3.how do i make it so you need a client to get on my server./color]
#4.how do i make the command ::alltome,and make everyone appear inside me.
#5.how do i make it so dds hit high on players.(with specs too)
[color=purple][/#6.how do i add a highscores on a website.color]
#7.how do i make the dd specs look like rs's dd specs,were the red stays inline with the dds.
#8.how do i make rune fire arrows work,when im holding them with a bow says,'no ammo left in quiver'.
last question...
#9.how do i get cords of the basic places.
i know this is probbaly a 'useless post' but i need my questions answer'd,so thanks. :P

item.title: All of my questions.im leaving sewn.!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

_Vengeance:

Use Firefox, and read the “tutorials” section.

Use firefox?? ROFL!

I think he specifically means he is going to have the internet cut off for 3 months, not the explorer button won’t work for 3 months…rofl!!

Anyway, yeah use the tuts. if you can’t find anything there, use the search bar, if you still don’t find out, post back saying what you need, and state that you have searched through the forums, and used the tut section.

-Josh.

Read full topic
